data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Jubbada Dhexe, Somalia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jubbada Dhexe, Somalia

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 8 believers in Jubbada Dhexe to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Jubbada Dhexe, Somalia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Jubbada Dhexe, Somalia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mushunguli people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please give the people in the state of Jubbada Dhexe access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, bring yourself glory in Jubbada Dhexe. Through your servants plant 10 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jubbada Dhexe, Somalia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
